outboundReferences.contextLine: One way to do this is using (dynamic) [[nested-sampling]].

inboundReferences.contextLine: Sampling bounded shells of the hypothesis space, in order to efficiently compute the Bayesian [[evidence]].
where $p(y)$ is the [[evidence]], $p(x)$ is the [[prior]], $p(x \vert y)$ is the [[posterior distribution]], and $p(y \vert x)$ is the [[conditional-distribution]] known as the likelihood.
